attributes.action: Put higher taxes on people owing a second car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our planet is being polluted and is getting worse everyday day so therefore, I prepose that we put a higher tax on people who own more than one car.  This is because they have more than they need, it will cut down on the air pollution and encourage people to use more public transport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
